00001 /**
00002  * \file Geod.cpp
00003  * \brief Command line utility for geodesic calculations
00004  *
00005  * Copyright (c) Charles Karney (2009, 2010, 2011) <charles@karney.com>
00006  * and licensed under the MIT/X11 License.  For more information, see
00007  * http://geographiclib.sourceforge.net/
00008  *
00009  * Compile and link with
00010  *   g++ -g -O3 -I../include -I../man -o Geod \
00011  *       Geod.cpp \
00012  *       ../src/DMS.cpp \
00013  *       ../src/Geodesic.cpp \
00014  *       ../src/GeodesicLine.cpp
00015  *
00016  * See the <a href="Geod.1.html">man page</a> for usage
00017  * information.
00018  **********************************************************************/

00020 #include <iostream>
00021 #include <sstream>
00022 #include <string>
00023 #include <sstream>
00024 #include <fstream>
00025 #include <GeographicLib/Geodesic.hpp>
00026 #include <GeographicLib/GeodesicLine.hpp>
00027 #include <GeographicLib/DMS.hpp>
00028 #include <GeographicLib/Utility.hpp>
00029 
00030 #include "Geod.usage"
00031 
00032 typedef GeographicLib::Math::real real;
00033 
00034 std::string LatLonString(real lat, real lon, int prec, bool dms) {
00035   using namespace GeographicLib;
00036   return dms ?
00037     DMS::Encode(lat, prec + 5, DMS::LATITUDE) + " " +
00038     DMS::Encode(lon, prec + 5, DMS::LONGITUDE) :
00039     DMS::Encode(lat, prec + 5, DMS::NUMBER) + " " +
00040     DMS::Encode(lon, prec + 5, DMS::NUMBER);
00041 }
00042 
00043 std::string AzimuthString(real azi, int prec, bool dms) {
00044   using namespace GeographicLib;
00045   return dms ? DMS::Encode(azi, prec + 5, DMS::AZIMUTH) :
00046     DMS::Encode(azi >= 180 ? azi - 360 : azi, prec + 5, DMS::NUMBER);
00047 }
00048 
00049 std::string DistanceStrings(real s12, real a12,
00050                             bool full, bool arcmode, int prec, bool dms) {
00051   using namespace GeographicLib;
00052   std::string s;
00053   if (full || !arcmode)
00054     s += Utility::str<real>(s12, prec);
00055   if (full)
00056     s += " ";
00057   if (full || arcmode)
00058     s += DMS::Encode(a12, prec + 5, dms ? DMS::NONE : DMS::NUMBER);
00059   return s;
00060 }
00061 
00062 real ReadDistance(const std::string& s, bool arcmode) {
00063   using namespace GeographicLib;
00064   return arcmode ? DMS::DecodeAngle(s) : Utility::num<real>(s);
00065 }
00066 
00067 int main(int argc, char* argv[]) {
00068   try {
00069     using namespace GeographicLib;
00070     bool linecalc = false, inverse = false, arcmode = false,
00071       dms = false, full = false;
00072     real
00073       a = Constants::WGS84_a<real>(),
00074       f = Constants::WGS84_f<real>();
00075     real lat1, lon1, azi1, lat2, lon2, azi2, s12, m12, a12, M12, M21, S12;
00076     real azi2sense = 0;
00077     int prec = 3;
00078     std::string istring, ifile, ofile;
00079 
00080     for (int m = 1; m < argc; ++m) {
00081       std::string arg(argv[m]);
00082       if (arg == "-i") {
00083         inverse = true;
00084         linecalc = false;
00085       } else if (arg == "-a")
00086         arcmode = true;
00087       else if (arg == "-l") {
00088         inverse = false;
00089         linecalc = true;
00090         if (m + 3 >= argc) return usage(1, true);
00091         try {
00092           DMS::DecodeLatLon(std::string(argv[m + 1]), std::string(argv[m + 2]),
00093                             lat1, lon1);
00094           azi1 = DMS::DecodeAzimuth(std::string(argv[m + 3]));
00095         }
00096         catch (const std::exception& e) {
00097           std::cerr << "Error decoding arguments of -l: " << e.what() << "\n";
00098           return 1;
00099         }
00100         m += 3;
00101       } else if (arg == "-e") {
00102         if (m + 2 >= argc) return usage(1, true);
00103         try {
00104           a = Utility::num<real>(std::string(argv[m + 1]));
00105           f = Utility::fract<real>(std::string(argv[m + 2]));
00106         }
00107         catch (const std::exception& e) {
00108           std::cerr << "Error decoding arguments of -e: " << e.what() << "\n";
00109           return 1;
00110         }
00111         m += 2;
00112       }
00113       else if (arg == "-d")
00114         dms = true;
00115       else if (arg == "-b")
00116         azi2sense = 180;
00117       else if (arg == "-f")
00118         full = true;
00119       else if (arg == "-p") {
00120         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00121         try {
00122           prec = Utility::num<int>(std::string(argv[m]));
00123         }
00124         catch (const std::exception&) {
00125           std::cerr << "Precision " << argv[m] << " is not a number\n";
00126           return 1;
00127         }
00128       } else if (arg == "--input-string") {
00129         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00130         istring = argv[m];
00131       } else if (arg == "--input-file") {
00132         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00133         ifile = argv[m];
00134       } else if (arg == "--output-file") {
00135         if (++m == argc) return usage(1, true);
00136         ofile = argv[m];
00137       } else if (arg == "--version") {
00138         std::cout
00139           << argv[0]
00140           << ": $Id: 6fb53e2b731f1709ea62061e7dbd94e2b9a6aaf2 $\n"
00141           << "GeographicLib version " << GEOGRAPHICLIB_VERSION_STRING << "\n";
00142         return 0;
00143       } else
00144         return usage(!(arg == "-h" || arg == "--help"), arg != "--help");
00145     }
00146 
00147     if (!ifile.empty() && !istring.empty()) {
00148       std::cerr << "Cannot specify --input-string and --input-file together\n";
00149       return 1;
00150     }
00151     if (ifile == "-") ifile.clear();
00152     std::ifstream infile;
00153     std::istringstream instring;
00154     if (!ifile.empty()) {
00155       infile.open(ifile.c_str());
00156       if (!infile.is_open()) {
00157         std::cerr << "Cannot open " << ifile << " for reading\n";
00158         return 1;
00159       }
00160     } else if (!istring.empty()) {
00161       std::string::size_type m = 0;
00162       while (true) {
00163         m = istring.find(';', m);
00164         if (m == std::string::npos)
00165           break;
00166         istring[m] = '\n';
00167       }
00168       instring.str(istring);
00169     }
00170     std::istream* input = !ifile.empty() ? &infile :
00171       (!istring.empty() ? &instring : &std::cin);
00172 
00173     std::ofstream outfile;
00174     if (ofile == "-") ofile.clear();
00175     if (!ofile.empty()) {
00176       outfile.open(ofile.c_str());
00177       if (!outfile.is_open()) {
00178         std::cerr << "Cannot open " << ofile << " for writing\n";
00179         return 1;
00180       }
00181     }
00182     std::ostream* output = !ofile.empty() ? &outfile : &std::cout;
00183 
00184     const Geodesic geod(a, f);
00185     GeodesicLine l;
00186     if (linecalc)
00187       l = geod.Line(lat1, lon1, azi1);
00188 
00189     // Max precision = 10: 0.1 nm in distance, 10^-15 deg (= 0.11 nm),
00190     // 10^-11 sec (= 0.3 nm).
00191     prec = std::min(10, std::max(0, prec));
00192     std::string s;
00193     int retval = 0;
00194     while (std::getline(*input, s)) {
00195       try {
00196         std::istringstream str(s);
00197         if (inverse) {
00198           std::string slat1, slon1, slat2, slon2;
00199           if (!(str >> slat1 >> slon1 >> slat2 >> slon2))
00200             throw GeographicErr("Incomplete input: " + s);
00201           std::string strc;
00202           if (str >> strc)
00203             throw GeographicErr("Extraneous input: " + strc);
00204           DMS::DecodeLatLon(slat1, slon1, lat1, lon1);
00205           DMS::DecodeLatLon(slat2, slon2, lat2, lon2);
00206           a12 = geod.Inverse(lat1, lon1, lat2, lon2, s12, azi1, azi2,
00207                              m12, M12, M21, S12);
00208           if (full)
00209             *output << LatLonString(lat1, lon1, prec, dms) << " ";
00210           *output << AzimuthString(azi1, prec, dms) << " ";
00211           if (full)
00212             *output << LatLonString(lat2, lon2, prec, dms) << " ";
00213           *output << AzimuthString(azi2 + azi2sense, prec, dms) << " "
00214                   << DistanceStrings(s12, a12, full, arcmode, prec, dms);
00215           if (full)
00216             *output << " " << Utility::str<real>(m12, prec)
00217                     << " " << Utility::str<real>(M12, prec+7)
00218                     << " " << Utility::str<real>(M21, prec+7)
00219                     << " " << Utility::str<real>(S12, std::max(prec-7, 0));
00220           *output << "\n";
00221         } else {
00222           if (linecalc) {
00223             std::string ss12;
00224             if (!(str >> ss12))
00225               throw GeographicErr("Incomplete input: " + s);
00226             std::string strc;
00227             if (str >> strc)
00228               throw GeographicErr("Extraneous input: " + strc);
00229             s12 = ReadDistance(ss12, arcmode);
00230             if (arcmode)
00231               l.ArcPosition(s12, lat2, lon2, azi2, a12, m12, M12, M21, S12);
00232             else
00233               a12 = l.Position(s12, lat2, lon2, azi2, m12, M12, M21, S12);
00234           } else {
00235             std::string slat1, slon1, sazi1, ss12;
00236             if (!(str >> slat1 >> slon1 >> sazi1 >> ss12))
00237               throw GeographicErr("Incomplete input: " + s);
00238             std::string strc;
00239             if (str >> strc)
00240               throw GeographicErr("Extraneous input: " + strc);
00241             DMS::DecodeLatLon(slat1, slon1, lat1, lon1);
00242             azi1 = DMS::DecodeAzimuth(sazi1);
00243             s12 = ReadDistance(ss12, arcmode);
00244             if (arcmode)
00245               geod.ArcDirect(lat1, lon1, azi1, s12, lat2, lon2, azi2, a12,
00246                              m12, M12, M21, S12);
00247             else
00248               a12 = geod.Direct(lat1, lon1, azi1, s12, lat2, lon2, azi2,
00249                                 m12, M12, M21, S12);
00250           }
00251           if (arcmode)
00252             std::swap(s12, a12);
00253           if (full)
00254             *output << LatLonString(lat1, lon1, prec, dms) << " "
00255                     << AzimuthString(azi1, prec, dms) << " ";
00256           *output << LatLonString(lat2, lon2, prec, dms) << " "
00257                   << AzimuthString(azi2 + azi2sense, prec, dms);
00258           if (full)
00259             *output << " "
00260                     << DistanceStrings(s12, a12, full, arcmode, prec, dms)
00261                     << " " << Utility::str<real>(m12, prec)
00262                     << " " << Utility::str<real>(M12, prec+7)
00263                     << " " << Utility::str<real>(M21, prec+7)
00264                     << " " << Utility::str<real>(S12, std::max(prec-7, 0));
00265           *output << "\n";
00266         }
00267       }
00268       catch (const std::exception& e) {
00269         // Write error message cout so output lines match input lines
00270         *output << "ERROR: " << e.what() << "\n";
00271         retval = 1;
00272       }
00273     }
00274     return retval;
00275   }
00276   catch (const std::exception& e) {
00277     std::cerr << "Caught exception: " << e.what() << "\n";
00278     return 1;
00279   }
00280   catch (...) {
00281     std::cerr << "Caught unknown exception\n";
00282     return 1;
00283   }
00284 }
